text: Hi, I'm having some trouble renewing my app test account (ID 25650992) which expired yesterday.. Anyone here help - it suggested to contact support?

Hi there! Quick and probably simple question, but I couldn't find anything on docs: is it possible our widget listen or get notified if an engagement is changed?

The context: we are developing a widget that needs to get an info from our app backend. We couldn't find a way to send the info directly to our widget and thought about update an engagement that is related to our service and widget get the information as well
